org.unc.lac.baboon.execution

Class HappeningControllerSynchronizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unc.lac.baboon.execution.HappeningControllerSynchronizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JoinPointObserver

    public class HappeningControllerSynchronizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements JoinPointObserver
    This class uses the BaboonPetriCore and the HappeningControllerSubscription objects from BaboonConfig to Synchronize the execution of HappeningController annotated methods. Also, to achieve the synchronization, this class implements JoinPointObserver to observe the aspect advices in HappeningControllerJoinPointReporter.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ariel Ivan Rabinovich, Juan Jose Arce Giacobbe

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.Object target,
                   java.lang.String methodName,
                   JoinPointObserver.State state)
        This method is called when a HappeningController method is about to be executed or when a HappeningController method execution just finished. It manages the synchronization of the HappeningController annotated method by firing the permission transition before the method execution, and by firing the transition callbacks and setting the guard callbacks after the method execution.
        Specified by:
        update in interface JoinPointObserver
        Parameters:
        target - The instance of the object invoking the HappeningController annotated method.
        methodName - The name of the HappeningController annotated method.
        state - The State of the execution of the HappeningController annotated method.
